name: Hitman Hearts
description:
Hitman Hearts

⚠ Warning: This game contains mature and violent language. ⚠ 

----

You play as Sora from Kingdom Hearts.

You get a call to the Disneys' President office to find out that the companys reputation is at risk.

You need to assassinate 4 evil targets that are responsible for damaging it.

Each room has an object that will assist you with the assassination.

Good luck in accomplishing your mission!

 ----

Game Developers: Sonia Raposo, Steven Hall & Tiago Berlim

Game developed using Bitsy: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

Game developed during a 3-day Bitsy Game Jam in the Videogames Course in Universidade Lusofona.
